subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: my opinion on the speech to text issue
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Frank,

>  There is a guy working on speech to text using the Speakjet, has a
> working version, and I've seen/heard it. Apparently there's patent 
> stuff involved, but it's supposed to be coming out. 

Did you really mean speech-to-text, or text-to-speech?

There's a text-to-speech IC for the SpeakJet:
http://www.speechchips.com/shop/item.aspx?itemid=4

Stefan
